aka: The New Testament of Jesus Christ According to John

director.name: 努诺·莱昂内尔 Nuno Leonel

this_title: O Novo Testamento De Jesus Cristo Segundo João
trans_title: The New Testament of Jesus Christ According to John
introduction: THE GOSPEL ACCORDING TO JOHN read by Luis Miguel Cintra, one of the most prominent Portuguese actors. A glimpse at a personal experience of Jesus, filmed outdoors, from dawn to sunset, and materialized in the grain of the voice, the expression, control, rhythm and breath of the actor himself.
chinese_title: O Novo Testamento De Jesus Cristo Segundo João
